author: PTI
title: UN Security Council yet to discuss coronavirus crisis under China’s presidency
description: China’s presidency of the 15-nation Council will end on March 31
content: The UN Security Council, under the presidency of China this month, has not yet scheduled any meeting to discuss the rapidly-escalating coronavirus crisis even as the number of COVID-19 cases across the world crossed 5,30,000 and over 24,000 people have died d… [+5448 chars]
